description: Numbers n such that 4*n^2 + 25 is prime.
references: E. Kogbetliantz and A. Krikorian, Handbook of First Complex Prime Numbers, Gordon and Breach, NY, 1971, p. 1.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
E. Kogbetliantz and A. Krikorian Handbook of First Complex Prime Numbers, Gordon and Breach, NY, 1971 [Annotated scans of a few pages]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
